title: Orbital Trajectory Calculation
description: Calculate orbital trajectory by rotating the satellite path 90° clockwise, then completing the pattern where missing trajectory points (0s) are filled based on the established sequence.
hints: First, rotate the grid 90° clockwise: [i][j] becomes [j][n-1-i].
Then fill missing values (0s) by completing the orbital pattern.
Orbital mechanics follows predictable trajectory sequences.
